strapiPost.title: Wooden Books
strapiPost.content:
Put on your sweaters, because tonight is opening night for the last art installation at the Famous Hardware building in Springdale.

  • Through the glass: The installations featured this time are a fictional used book store from the 1970s, and a multi layered mural â€œthat changes dramatically from daytime to nighttime" that fills the windows of the Famous Hardware store. 
  • Pizza party: A slice of pizza is on the house for those who attend the opening night until the pizza runs out. If you get a slice from The Odd Soul and wear a Christmas sweater, you get a second slice...

More information HERE.
